name: prometheus-site
description: Performance-forward monorepo for Qwik City web and Bun Elysia API services.

scripts.docker:prod: sh -c "docker compose -f docker-compose.yml --profile prod stop web || true; docker compose -f docker-compose.yml --profile prod rm -f web || true; docker compose -f docker-compose.yml --profile prod up --build -d"
scripts.build: bun run --cwd apps/web build && bun run --cwd apps/api build
scripts.lint: bun run --cwd apps/web check:scripts && bunx --bun oxlint apps/web apps/api
scripts.lint:all: bun run typecheck && bunx --bun oxlint . --ignore-pattern node_modules
scripts.typecheck: bunx --bun tsc -p apps/web/tsconfig.json --noEmit && bunx --bun tsc -p apps/api/tsconfig.json --noEmit
scripts.format: bun run --cwd apps/web format && bun run --cwd apps/api format
scripts.test: bun run --cwd apps/web test && bun run --cwd apps/api test
